conversations.english: Welcome to the company. We are conducting a survey of new employees to find out what influenced them to choose our company.
conversations.chinese: 欢迎加盟本公司。我们正在对新员工进行调查，看看你们为什么选择本公司。
conversations.reply_english: That's easy. It was your office ergonomics that decided me.
conversations.reply_chinese: 很简单。你们办公场所的益生学设计吸引了我。

conversations.english: Welcome to the company. We are conducting a survey of new employees to find out what influenced them to choose our company.
conversations.chinese: 欢迎加盟本公司。我们正在对新员工进行调查，想知道你们为什么选择本公司。
conversations.reply_english: Honestly, the flexible hours were the main attraction for me. The traditional working day doesn't fit in with me lifestyle; I love being able to tailor my working hours.
conversations.reply_chinese: 老实说，弹性的工作时间安排是吸引我的关键因素。我个人的生活方式　不太适应传统的工作时间安排。我很高兴可以灵活高速自己的工作时间。

conversations.english: So you've been attending night classes for a while now. Do you feel it's helping you?
conversations.chinese: 你参加夜校有一段日子了。你觉得对你有帮助吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes,furthering my education is already bringing about positive results in my workplace as it has boosted my confidence.As well the tutoring system my school employs offers courses uniquely suite
conversations.reply_chinese: 有，进修已经在我工作上产生了积极的效果，增强了我的自信心。而且，学校的辅导体系所提供的课程与我的需要和目标相当吻合。

conversations.english: I hate to be the bearer of bad news, but it's that time of year again. Have you got your performance evaluations finished yet?
conversations.chinese: 我不喜欢宣布坏消息，但又到每年这个时候了。你的业绩评估做完了吗？
conversations.reply_english: Oh no! Evaluations! You can tell that's not my favorite job; I haven't even started yet. When is the deadline for turning in thecompleted forms?
conversations.reply_chinese: 噢，不！业绩评估！你肯定知道那不是我喜欢的工作；我还没开始呢。上交表格的截止日期是什么时候？

conversations.english: Can you tell me, Ms. Smith, about the training programs you initiated this year?
conversations.chinese: Smith女士,你能向我介绍一下今年你发起的培训计划的情况吗?
conversations.reply_english: We ran a call center training service and language program to ensure that our customer service representatives are well trained.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我们开办了电话中心服务培训和语言培训,以保证服务人员受到良好的培训.

conversations.english: Have you had a chance to look over the contract?
conversations.chinese: 你有机会看一下合约吗？

conversations.english: Well, we've finally put the finishing touches on the training programs for next year. Here's a report showing the projected costs as well as the expected return on investment.
conversations.chinese: 我们明年的培训项目策划已经接近尾声了.这是关于预期投入和预期投资回报的报告.
conversations.reply_english: Return on investment? How can you have a return on this kind of investment? Can you really calculate the value of these training programs?
conversations.reply_chinese: 投资回报?这种投资怎么会有回报?你真的能算出培训项目的价值吗?
